channel.title: Inside The Fire :: Disturbed
channel.description:
Have you heard this song. its awsome. i guess its about his 14-15 year old girlfriend who commited suicide and the devil wanted him to do it also.. ill put a story link up.
Video with suicide prevention intro: [url=http://youtube.com/watch?v=oXV1QqPFg5w]http://youtube.com/watch?v=oXV1QqPFg5w[/url]
